description: Explore the beauty of Mount Fuji and enjoy an evening of fun and food with friends and family! We will have a bonfire, games, and more.
Discover the beauty of Kinkaku-ji, the Golden Pavilion, and enjoy a day of fun and food with friends and family! We will have a bonfire, games, and more.
Enjoy a night of fun and food with friends and family on the sandy dunes of beautiful Kikugahama Beach! We will have a bonfire, games, and more.
